===The DOC Style===
&lt;TABLE WIDTH=100% CELLPADDING=10 CELLSPACING=10&gt;&lt;TR&gt;&lt;TD WIDTH=40% VALIGN=TOP&gt;
The DOC style is  a simple rich-text document markup method to easily format
the text of display notes, instructions, and comments.

The DOC style uses the same basic rules as REBOL'S '''MakeDoc'''.

Examples may be found by running '''Demo''' at the R3 console, then &quot;Run Test&quot;
